arguments.description: The name of the file type to validate. Valid values are: policy_file
arguments.name: NAME

arguments.description: Optional version argument (purpose unclear from TXT)
arguments.name: VERSION

description: Verify that a local policy file is valid. NAME is the name of the file type to validate. Valid values are: policy_file

options.description: Path where the generated file will be saved. Default: current directory
options.name: --path
